ships.name: Delta Flyer
ships.text:
You may deploy [weapon] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

You may fire your Primary Weapon from your rear firing arc at -1 attack die.

ships.name: Federation Starship
ships.text: You may deploy [weapon] Upgrades with a cost of 4 SP or less to this ship.

captains.name: Tom Paris
captains.text: If you reveal a 3[straight] Maneuver, you may perform a 4[straight] Maneuver instead. If you do so, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. If this card is assigned to a shuttlecraft, you cannot perform a Docking Action on the round you use this ability.

captains.name: Tuvok
captains.text: Add 1 [tech] Upgrade slot to your Upgrade Bar. That Upgrade costs -1 SP.

upgrades.name: B'Elanna Torres
upgrades.text: When defending, during the Compare Results step, you may disable this card and 1 of your Active Shields to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result.

upgrades.name: Harry Kim
upgrades.text: ACTION: Disable this card to place 2 [evade] Tokens beside your ship. You cannot roll any defense dice this round. You cannot perform an [evade] Action this round, even as a free Action.

upgrades.name: Seven of Nine
upgrades.text: During the Activation Phase, you may disable this card to perform a [battlestations] Action as a free Action.

upgrades.name: Parametallic Hull Plating
upgrades.text:
During the Compare Results step, you may discard this card to cancel 1 [hit] or [crit] result.

This Upgrade costs +3 SP for any non-Federation ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Parametallic Hull Plating Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Immersion Shielding
upgrades.text:
Add +1 to your ship's Shield value. In addition, you may re-roll the attack die wihen your ship overlaps an Obstacle.

This Upgrade costs +3 SP for any non-Federation ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Immersion Shielding Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Unimatrix Shielding
upgrades.text:
Add +2 to your ship's Shield value. When defending against an attack from a Borg ship, during the Compare Results step, you may disable up to 2 of your Active Shields to cancel an equal number of [hit] or [crit] results.

This Upgrade costs +5 SP for any non-Federation ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 Unimatrix Shielding Upgrade.

upgrades.name: Photonic Missiles
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and place 3 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack.
If this attack hits, in addition to normal damage, place an Auxiliary Power Token beside the defending ship.
You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.

upgrades.name: Photon Torpedoes
upgrades.text:
ATTACK: (Target Lock) Spend your target lock and place 3 Time Tokens on this card to perform this attack.
If fired from a shuttlecraft, discard this card instead of placing the Time Tokens and the Range is 1-2.

You may fire this weapon from your forward or rear firing arcs.
